name: Education minigames
description:
These are two educational minigames developed for Istanbul Technical University's Camapoli project. Camapoli is a collection of educational games aiming to create awareness of climate change in young people. The project was funded by the European Union and executed in coordination with WRI. The finished game can be downloaded from this address for Android platform:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ITUTegam.Camapoli

The two minigames you will find here are the contributions I made to the first level. The graphical assets are ready-bought and all coding is done by me.
